Questions: 1. Which movie has won the most number of Oscars?
Explanation: Explanation: Nominated for 14 Academy Awards, Titanic tied All About Eve (1950) for the most Oscar nominations, and won 11, including the awards for Best Picture and Best Director, tying Ben-Hur (1959) for the most Oscars won by a single film. Written and directed by James Cameron, Titanic was the first film to reach the billion-dollar mark.

Questions: 2. Who won the Best Actor Award at International Indian Film Academy Awards(IIFA) 2023?
Explanation: Explanation: Hrithik Roshan won the award for Best Actor in a Leading Role (male) for his film Vikram Vedha at the International Indian Film Academy Awards (IIFA) 2023 held in Abu Dhabi.

Questions: 3. Which actress has been conferred with the International Association of Working Women Award 2022?
Explanation: Explanation: Former Miss Universe Sushmita Sen has been conferred the International Association of Working Women Award for performance by a female actor in a TV series for her show Aarya 2

Questions: 4. What is the name of Alia Bhatt and Ranbir Kapoors daughter?
Explanation: Explanation: Alia Bhatt and Ranbir Kapoor welcomed their first child Raha in November 2022

Questions: 5. Who is the highest-grossing actor in South Indian cinema?
Explanation: Explanation: Rajinikanth is widely regarded as one of the greatest actors in Indian cinema and has appeared in numerous blockbuster films. His movies consistently perform well at the box office, making him the highest-grossing actor in South Indian cinema.
